name: Galaxy: The Blitz2 Remix '96
overview: An Open Source, fast and fun blitz blaster. Simple to start but dangerously addictive. Destroy as many of the invading aliens as possible. Get as high a score as you can and have fun. Created in Blitz 2.1 by David Christian. Blast all the alien scum in this single screen shooter, get powerups to upgrade your gun! You can move all around the screen, not just left and right.
